about_the_game:
Good times and bad, war and peace, love and sadness... Cinematic Sountrack brings musical moments from many genres to your game! Fifty total tracks will fill your towns, dungeons, battles, and cutscenes with dramatic sound. Includes the full forty from the original RPG Maker VX Ace release and ten bonus tracks for the MV release!

Features:

- 50 total tracks: the full 40 from the original RPG Maker VX Ace release plus 10 new bonus tracks!
- Looped and alternate mixes for many tracks.
- Music for battles, towns, peaceful times, sadness, mystery, and dark moments of dread!
- .ogg and .m4a formats included.
- Royalty free music to use in your RPG Maker MV games.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Cinematic Soundtrack" and "RPG Maker MV - Cinematic Soundtrack" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game

Good times and bad, war and peace, love and sadness... Cinematic Sountrack brings musical moments from many genres to your game! Fifty total tracks will fill your towns, dungeons, battles, and cutscenes with dramatic sound. Includes the full forty from the original RPG Maker VX Ace release and ten bonus tracks for the MV release! Features: - 50 total tracks: the full 40 from the original RPG Maker VX Ace release plus 10 new bonus tracks! - Looped and alternate mixes for many tracks. - Music for battles, towns, peaceful times, sadness, mystery, and dark moments of dread! - .ogg and .m4a formats included. - Royalty free music to use in your RPG Maker MV games. 1 - Battle - Angry Avenger 2 - Battle - Brutal Boss 3 - Battle - Cyborg Commando 4 - Battle - Dramatic Damage 5 - Battle - Elven Enemy 6 - Battle - Forest Fight 7 - Battle - Incoming Invaders 8 - Battle - Monster Masher 9 - Battle - Nasty Natives 10 - Battle - Perilous Pulse 11 - Dark - Conspirators 12 - Dark - Creeping Horror 13 - Dark - Criminal Mind 14 - Dark - Dark Alley 15 - Dark - Dungeon Delvers 16 - Dark - Eerie Inhabitants 17 - Dark - Night Fright 18 - Dark - Shattered Ruins 19 - Dark - Shattered Ruins ALT 20 - Dark - Tomb Explorer 21 - Dark - Tomb Explorer ALT 22 - Eerie - Hearing Voices 23 - Eerie - Strange Place 24 - Eerie - Unwelcoming Party 25 - Fantasy - Mountain Pass 26 - Fantasy - The Northern Plains 27 - Mysterious - Haunted Castle 28 - Mysterious - Haunted Castle ALT 29 - Mysterious - Hidden Realm 30 - Mysterious - Meditation Chamber 31 - Mysterious - Temple Garden 32 - Orchestral Action - Against All Odds 33 - Orchestral Action - Enemy Positions 34 - Orchestral Action - Last Stand 35 - Orchestral Action - No Surrender 36 - Orchestral Action - Tides Of War 37 - Peaceful - Countryside 38 - Peaceful - Noble Kingdom 39 - Peaceful - Princess Dreams 40 - Peaceful - Sanctuary 41 - Peaceful - Secluded Glade 42 - Peaceful - Secret Place 43 - Sad - Difficult Decision 44 - Sad - Lost Love 45 - Sad - Melancholy Night 46 - Sad - Untimely Illness 47 - Town - Busy Marketplace 48 - Town - Heartland 49 - Town - Nice Place 50 - Town - Remembering Home 51 - Town - Safe Haven 52 - Town - Seaside Village 53 - Town - Small Town Welcome Terms of Use: * This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice. * OK to be used in Commercial projects * Contents can be edited * OK for use in games with gore * OK for use in adult-rated games

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Cinematic Soundtrack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: RPG Maker MV - Cinematic Soundtrack - $19.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Cinematic Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: The Cinematic Soundtrack pack by composer Joel Steudler brings emotion and energy to your game with lush orchestrations, blazing battles, and a vast variety of genres covered. Ten new bonus tracks join the original forty for the RPG Maker MV release!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
